name: ARKANSAS FARM BUREAU FEDERATION
sampleDescriptions: WOTUS rule: Called congressional members to encourage support of language already included in appropriations legislation that would allow the Administrator to withdraw the WOTUS rule.

Agricultural Exceptions and Exemptions to the Federal Motor Carrier Safety Administration Hours of Service (HOS) and Commerical Driver's License (CDL)Rules. Comments submitted to DOT Ag HOS guidance e
Water Resources Development Act (WRDA)H.R.8 discussed a letter outlining our support or opposition to certain amendments.
Farm Bill H.R.2 Participated in a conference call regarding the bill. Reached out to Arkansas members of Congress to support the bill.
Participated in numerous conference calls regarding the Farm Bill. Contacted House and Senate members address issues with side-by-side comparison of House and Senate versions of Farm Bill.
